H0.text: who is the current governor of arizona 2010. John McCain

H1.text: who is the current governor of arizona 2010. Jon Kyl

H2.text: who is the current governor of arizona 2010. Terry Goddard

H3.text: who is the current governor of arizona 2010. Jan Brewer

A4.text: Janice Kay Brewer was elected as the governor of Arizona in 2010.

A5.text: Terry Goddard was the opponent of Janice Kay Brewer in the 2010 Arizona gubernatorial election.

A6.text: In April 2010, Jan Brewer signed Arizona SB 1070 into law.

A7.text: Goddard lost the 2010 Arizona gubernatorial election to Jan Brewer by a nearly 12-point margin.
